items.title: 3 Dividend Stocks to Hold for the Next 10 Years
items.description: Coca-Cola's global footprint is a strength.  McDonald's is the world's top fast-food franchise and plans to open 2,200 new locations this year.  The best thing about dividend stocks is that they're ideal for all types of investors.

items.title: 39.1% of Warren Buffett's $291 Billion Portfolio Is Invested in 3 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks
items.author: Bram Berkowitz
items.description: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway portfolio is significantly invested in AI-related stocks, with 39.1% allocated across Apple, American Express, and Amazon, demonstrating strategic positioning in emerging technological sectors.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: Currently struggling with stock performance (-13.5% in 2025) due to tariff challenges, but has strong long-term potential with innovative AI integration and market presence
Actively developing AI capabilities through a dedicated Frontier Research Team, focusing on improving customer services, credit decisions, and operational efficiency
Committed to significant AI investments (potentially $100 billion), developing AI tools, cloud services, and infrastructure to capitalize on emerging AI technologies
